personal.name: Ajinkya Taranekar
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.tagline: Full Stack Developer | Problem Solver | Tech Enthusiast
bio: I'm a passionate Software Engineer with a deep love for technology and innovation. My journey in the world of programming began with curiosity and evolved into a commitment to creating impactful solutions.

I specialize in full-stack development, with expertise in modern web technologies, cloud platforms, and software architecture. I believe in writing clean, efficient code and staying updated with the latest industry trends.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Developing scalable web applications using modern tech stack. Working on frontend and backend components, implementing best practices, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Built and maintained web applications. Implemented new features, optimized performance, and worked closely with the design team to create user-friendly interfaces.

experiences.title: Software Development Intern
experiences.description: Contributed to the development of core features. Worked on frontend components, API integration, and database optimization.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Built with modern web technologies for optimal performance.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and analytics dashboard. Designed for productivity and ease of use.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern portfolio website built with SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS. Features dark mode, responsive design, and smooth animations.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time weather dashboard with forecasts, maps, and historical data visualization. Integrates with weather APIs for accurate data.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science
education.description: Focused on software engineering, data structures, algorithms, and web technologies. Active member of coding club and tech societies.
achievements: Published research paper on Machine Learning

education.description: Specialized in Science stream with Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry.
